What is EcoTrace and what technologies were used to build it?

EcoTrace is a comprehensive digital waste management platform that Salah developed to address environmental challenges through technology. It's designed to streamline waste management processes and promote sustainable practices.

**Project Overview:**
EcoTrace digitalizes and streamlines waste management processes, connecting individuals, companies, logistics coordinators, transporters, and technicians in an efficient eco-friendly ecosystem with complete traceability from collection request to final processing.

**Technologies Used:**
â€¢ Frontend: React 18, Vite, Tailwind CSS
â€¢ Backend: Django 4.2, Django REST Framework
â€¢ Authentication: JWT Authentication
â€¢ Database: MySQL/PostgreSQL

**Key Features:**
â€¢ Multi-role system for all stakeholders
â€¢ Digital waste tracking with complete traceability
â€¢ Smart collection planning and route optimization
â€¢ Real-time notifications and status updates
â€¢ Waste categorization and recycling center location services
â€¢ Eco-tips and educational content
â€¢ User progress monitoring

**Technical Highlights:**
â€¢ Full-stack application with modern tech stack
â€¢ Role-based access control for 6 different user types
â€¢ Automated route optimization for waste collections
â€¢ Mobile-responsive design for all devices
â€¢ RESTful API architecture

**GitHub Repository:** https://github.com/SalahKhadir/ecotrace-pfa

This project demonstrates Salah's ability to create comprehensive solutions that address real-world environmental challenges while showcasing his expertise in modern web development technologies.

Tell me about SkillSync - what is it and how was it built?

SkillSync is a modern, full-stack recruitment platform that Salah developed to streamline the hiring process for both recruiters and job seekers. It features an intuitive user interface with modern design patterns and comprehensive candidate management capabilities.

**Project Overview:**
SkillSync bridges the gap between employers and job seekers by providing intelligent matching based on skills and requirements. The platform offers a complete recruitment solution with features designed for both sides of the hiring process.

**Technologies Used:**
â€¢ Frontend: React.js, Material-UI, Custom CSS
â€¢ Backend: Python
â€¢ Database: MySQL
â€¢ API: RESTful API architecture

This project showcases Salah's expertise in creating user-focused applications with modern frontend technologies and demonstrates his understanding of complex business logic in recruitment and HR systems.

What is the Pharmacy Management System and what makes it special?

The Pharmacy Management System is a comprehensive desktop application that Salah developed using Java to manage all aspects of pharmacy operations. It's designed to streamline pharmacy workflows and ensure accurate medication management.

**Project Overview:**
This system provides role-based access control for administrators and pharmacists with complete inventory management, sales processing, and automated reporting capabilities. It's built as a robust desktop solution for pharmacy operations.

**Technologies Used:**
â€¢ Programming Language: Java
â€¢ GUI Framework: Java Swing
â€¢ Database: MySQL 8.0
â€¢ Database Connectivity: JDBC
â€¢ PDF Generation: iText PDF library
â€¢ Date Management: JCalendar

**Key Features:**
â€¢ Role-based access for administrators and pharmacists
â€¢ FIFO (First In, First Out) inventory with automatic stock rotation
â€¢ Complete point-of-sale system with cart functionality
â€¢ Automated PDF invoice generation with auto-print capability
â€¢ Medicine inventory management
â€¢ Prescription tracking and validation
â€¢ Sales and billing functionality
â€¢ Supplier management
â€¢ Comprehensive reporting system

**Technical Highlights:**
â€¢ Desktop application with professional Java Swing GUI
â€¢ Real-time search with dynamic filtering capabilities
â€¢ Comprehensive input validation and error handling
â€¢ Secure authentication with role management
â€¢ Automated stock rotation to prevent medication expiry
â€¢ Professional invoice generation with company branding
â€¢ Database optimization for fast queries

**GitHub Repository:** https://github.com/SalahKhadir/Pharmacy-Management-System

This project demonstrates Salah's proficiency in Java desktop development and his ability to create complex business applications with multiple user roles, inventory management, and automated processes.

Salah's journey into Computer Engineering & Networks has an interesting origin story rooted in his childhood passion for gaming.

**What Motivated His Field Choice:**
Salah chose Computer Engineering & Networks because of his love for gaming when he was a kid. This early fascination with games naturally led him to become curious about how technology works behind the scenes, eventually guiding him toward a career in computer engineering.

**Programming Journey:**
Salah started programming as a child with Python as his first programming language. His introduction to coding was through Python's turtle library, where he learned to draw figures and shapes. This creative and visual approach to programming helped him fall in love with coding from an early age.

**What He Finds Most Satisfying:**
What Salah finds most satisfying about programming and software development is seeing the result of his code come to life. He enjoys the moment when his code works and produces the intended outcome - that satisfaction of turning ideas into functional reality.

**Professional Focus:**
Salah admires companies that offer continuous development opportunities and help him stay up-to-date with the latest technologies. He values environments that foster learning and professional growth, particularly in cutting-edge fields like AI and machine learning.
